GO FOR PROTECTION.name: GO FOR PROTECTION
productFeature: Hydrates and protects the skin from external aggressions (pollution, blue light, infrared, UVA) that accelerate skin ageing
Radiance is preserved and the signs of ageing linked to oxidative stress are pushed back

ingredients.benefits: Protection and balance of skin microbiota
otherInfo: Nutritive elements (minerals, polysaccharides, peptides ...) intended to promote the proper development of the skin microbiome
Rich in antioxidants
Higher concentration of active ingredients (polyphenols, tannins) than standard green tea: 137 times more powerful
Molecule capable of capturing up to 100 times its size in water
Naturally present in the skin but gradually decreases from 25 years

SCLUPT&GLOW.name: SCLUPT&GLOW
productFeature: Redensifies, smoothes, nourishes, soothes and protects for a firmer and more luminous skin

ingredientFeatures: Maintains the barrier and preserves the diversity of the microbiota
Boosts natural antioxidant and anti-bacterial defenses
otherInfo: This post-biotic with a pre-biotic effect and a unique lipidic composition acts on the skin's ecosystem to maintain its barrier function, preserve the diversity of the microbiota and rebalance it. It boosts the skin's natural anti-oxidant and antibacterial defenses, strengthens the cohesion of the dermo-epidermal junction and increases the synthesis and transport of epidermal lipids

ingredientFeatures: Redensifies the dermis and smoothes the skin texture
Reduces pores and brightens the complexion
otherInfo: Extract of marine fennel increases the synthesis of collagen and reduces its degradation

ingredientFeatures: Soothes and protects DNA from photo-aging
otherInfo: DNA and photo-aging protector against UV-induced damage. Reduces skin inflammation mediators subjected to UV, significantly protects DNA from UVB-induced damage, thus preventing premature skin aging caused by oxidative stress, and enhances skin photoprotection even without UV filters
